requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 / Intel Core i5 2400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7870 / NVIDIA GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 / Intel Core i5 2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
